level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor may promulgate rules necessary to implement this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 3 of Film DC Economic Incentive Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-570, December 19, 2006, 54 DCR 8).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-290, see notes following ยง 39-501.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority under the Financial Incentives for Motion Picture and Television Productions Emergency Amendment Act of 2009, effective October 15, 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207; 56 DCR 8277), see Mayor's Order 2009-213, December 8, 2009 (56 DCR 9350).
